name: Nadel Phelan
tag_list: public-relation, marketing, press-releases, contributed-articles, media-relations, press-relations, analyst-relations, trade-shows, awards, thought-leadership, blogging, social-media, technology, vertical-markets, telecommunications
overview:
Strategic and tactical public relations focused on wireless, security and infrastructure with vertical market expertise.

Founded in 1993, Nadel Phelan, Inc. provides strategic communications for leading technology companies. With an inside perspective on media and market trends combined with key relationships in the business and trade press, Nadel Phelan is positioned to deliver highly effective media relations for a range of clients from venerable industry giants to innovative venture funded start ups. Nadel Phelan provides its clients with the strategic and tactical services necessary to establish and maintain global marketplace leadership. The company is headquartered in Silicon Valley, California with offices in New York, London and Hong Kong.

Nadel Phelan, Inc. incorporates a unique blend of technology expertise that is specific to vertical markets including telecommunications, financial services, government, retail, education, and healthcare. Our team has extensive knowledge in wireless, security, application development, SOA, digital content management, semiconductor, Web 2.0 and converged communications. Whether a client is developing, releasing or repositioning a product, Nadel Phelan offers the pertinent essentials to maintain your marketing edge and to stay ahead of the competition.
